includedAssets.title: Albification
includedAssets.synopsis: A white separatist group takes root in Charming and threatens more than just SAMCRO's control over the town.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A white separatist group takes root in Charming and threatens more than just SAMCRO's control over the town.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A white separatist group takes root in Charming and threatens more than just SAMCRO's control over the town.

includedAssets.title: Small Tears
includedAssets.synopsis: Gemma finds herself unable to tell either Clay or Jax about a traumatic event. Meanwhile, a rival adult film producer moves to put Luanne out of business.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Gemma finds herself unable to tell either Clay or Jax about a traumatic event. A rival adult film producer moves to put Luanne out of business.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Gemma finds herself unable to tell either Clay or Jax about a traumatic event. Meanwhile, a rival adult film producer moves to put Luanne out of business.

includedAssets.title: Fix
includedAssets.synopsis: Zobelle looks to undermine SAMCRO while Jax's involvement in Luanne's adult film business starts to get to Tara.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Zobelle looks to undermine SAMCRO while Jax's involvement in Luanne's adult film business starts to get to Tara.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Zobelle looks to undermine SAMCRO while Jax's involvement in Luanne's adult film business starts to get to Tara.

includedAssets.title: Eureka
includedAssets.synopsis: Tensions between Jax and Clay escalate when they disagree over the strategy for rescuing Tig after he's captured by bounty hunters on a gun-running mission.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Tensions between Jax and Clay escalate when they disagree over the strategy for rescuing Tig after he's captured by bounty hunters.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Tensions between Jax and Clay escalate when they disagree over the strategy for rescuing Tig after he's captured by bounty hunters on a gun-running mission.

includedAssets.title: Smite
includedAssets.synopsis: While Jax and Clay lock horns over how to deal with Zobelle, Tara finds herself ensnared in Gemma's emotional struggle.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Jax and Clay lock horns over how to deal with Zobelle, Tara finds herself ensnared in Gemma's emotional struggle.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Jax and Clay lock horns over how to deal with Zobelle, Tara finds herself ensnared in Gemma's emotional struggle.

includedAssets.title: Falx Cerebri
includedAssets.synopsis: Clay plots retaliation against Zobelle, forcing Jax to turn to an unlikely source to save the club from destruction. Gemma gives Tara a lesson in anger management.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Clay plots retaliation against Zobelle, forcing Jax to turn to an unlikely source to save the club from destruction.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Clay plots retaliation against Zobelle, forcing Jax to turn to an unlikely source to save the club from destruction. Gemma gives Tara a lesson in anger management.

includedAssets.title: Gilead
includedAssets.synopsis: Agent Stahl, who has an agenda of her own, offers Clay and Jax separate propositions, while Gemma calls in a favour from Elliott Oswald.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Agent Stahl, who has an agenda of her own, offers Clay and Jax separate propositions, while Gemma calls in a favour from Elliott Oswald.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Agent Stahl, who has an agenda of her own, offers Clay and Jax separate propositions, while Gemma calls in a favour from Elliott Oswald.

includedAssets.title: Potlatch
includedAssets.synopsis: Zobelle's business dealings with SAMCRO's rivals exacerbate divisions in the club. Meanwhile, Clay comes to an agreement with Elliott Oswald.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Zobelle's business dealings with SAMCRO's rivals exacerbate divisions in the club. Meanwhile, Clay comes to an agreement with Elliott Oswald.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Zobelle's business dealings with SAMCRO's rivals exacerbate divisions in the club. Meanwhile, Clay comes to an agreement with Elliott Oswald.

includedAssets.title: FA Guan
includedAssets.synopsis: When SAMCRO's adult film business becomes a hindrance to the club, Clay seizes the opportunity to revive the gun-running cartel.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When SAMCRO's adult film business becomes a hindrance to the club, Clay seizes the opportunity to revive the gun-running cartel.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When SAMCRO's adult film business becomes a hindrance to the club, Clay seizes the opportunity to revive the gun-running cartel.

includedAssets.title: Balm
includedAssets.synopsis: Agent Stahl takes notice at the handsome profits SAMCRO is reaping. Meanwhile, the Jax-Clay standoff forces Gemma to make a difficult decision.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Agent Stahl takes notice at the handsome profits SAMCRO is reaping. Meanwhile, the Jax-Clay standoff forces Gemma to make a difficult decision.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Agent Stahl takes notice at the handsome profits SAMCRO is reaping. Meanwhile, the Jax-Clay standoff forces Gemma to make a difficult decision.

includedAssets.title: Service
includedAssets.synopsis: While Opie seeks both revenge and reconciliation, Chibs makes a secret deal with agent Stahl to protect his wife and daughter.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Opie seeks both revenge and reconciliation, Chibs makes a secret deal with agent Stahl to protect his wife and daughter.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Opie seeks both revenge and reconciliation, Chibs makes a secret deal with agent Stahl to protect his wife and daughter.

includedAssets.title: The Culling
includedAssets.synopsis: Jax and Clay prepare for their impending showdown with Zobelle's group. Meanwhile, AJ Weston learns the truth about Zobelle's business dealings in Charming.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jax and Clay prepare for their impending showdown with Zobelle's group. AJ Weston learns the truth about Zobelle's business dealings in Charming.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jax and Clay prepare for their impending showdown with Zobelle's group. Meanwhile, AJ Weston learns the truth about Zobelle's business dealings in Charming.

includedAssets.title: Na Triobloidi
includedAssets.synopsis: As SAMCRO attempts to rid Charming of Zobelle and The League permanently, familiar faces present new challenges. Last in series.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As SAMCRO attempts to rid Charming of Zobelle and The League permanently, familiar faces present new challenges. Last in series.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As SAMCRO attempts to rid Charming of Zobelle and The League permanently, familiar faces present new challenges. Last in series.

includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Ron Perlman and Charlie Hunnam lead a ragtag band of bikers in Kurt Sutter's award-winning crime drama. In season two, Jax and Clay vie for leadership of SAMCRO while a menacing group of white separatists arrive in Charming, looking to drive the bikers out of town.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jax and Clay vie for leadership of SAMCRO while a menacing group of white separatists arrive in Charming, looking to drive the bikers out of town.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Ron Perlman and Charlie Hunnam lead a ragtag band of bikers in Kurt Sutter's award-winning crime drama. In season two, Jax and Clay vie for leadership of SAMCRO while a menacing group of white separatists arrive in Charming, looking to drive the bikers out of town.

includedIn.title: Sons Of Anarchy
includedIn.synopsis: Ron Perlman, Charlie Hunnam and Katey Sagal star in this award-winning US crime drama which follows a ragtag band of bikers in the quiet town of Charming, California. Hunnam plays Jax, the vice president of SAMCRO, an outlaw motorcycle club who battle both drug dealers and law enforcement in an attempt to protect their hometown. Jax, however, begins to grow concerned with the violent direction the club is taking…
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Top crime drama which follows an outlaw motorcycle club who battle both drug dealers and law enforcement in an attempt to protect their hometown.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Ron Perlman, Charlie Hunnam and Katey Sagal star in this award-winning US crime drama which follows a ragtag band of bikers in the quiet town of Charming, California. Hunnam plays Jax, the vice president of SAMCRO, an outlaw motorcycle club who battle both drug dealers and law enforcement in an attempt to protect their hometown. Jax, however, begins to grow concerned with the violent direction the club is taking…
